name: The Janinator
description:
Description

    You play as the head technician working for the company At-Last. You wake up to perform your morning routine when you're suddenly interrupted by an experiment gone wrong. BUGS! Your new job now is to escape the facility while killing as many bugs as possible. 

Just make sure to clean up after yourself! ;)  

(and watch the wet floor)

Credits

- Head Programmer: Michael Frye

- Head 3D Artist: Joseph Cruz

- Associate 3D Artist: Gabriel LaForge

- Associate Programmer/Artist: Mike Mitchell

- Former 3D Artist: Dante Ponzini

- Former Programmers:
